Articles.Content:
Rules:

This is a game where you guess things about the person who will post after you. Then, this person replies with "true" or "false" and then makes a new guess about the next poster.

Let the games begin!

The user below me is younger than 18 years.

False.

The user below me is from Canada!

Nope, I'm from China but emigrated to California 3 years agp.

The user below me had registered before me.

True.

The user below me has a pet.

True. 15.

The user below me is a user.

False, I'm a program

The user below me has seen the Sound of Music more than four time

False, not even once.

The user below me is using Windows.

True, Windows 7 32 bits.

The user below me is using Windows 7 or later.

True, Windows 7 64 bits. (Doesn't that resonate nicely with my name? )

The user below me is using a computer.

How did you guess?

The user below me have not upgraded Windows 7 to Windows 7 SP1.

NUUUUU. False.

(We had a real good streak there!)

The person below me was affected by the DDoS of '13 in some way.

True, loss of many posts and many threads. (I have only 6 threads and probably 36 posts when the fix is done.)

The user below me had registered after October 2012. (When the recovery data was done.)

Edited April 21, 2013 by Designer225

Yes. Jan2013.

The user below me is a completely new member, as in not a member before the DDoS.

Yup.

The user below me has had 100 posts before - Before or after the DDoS ive heard about.

True. I had over 600

The person below me has snacks handy at their desk

False. I have yogart.

The person below me has survived the april attack.

True, joined KSP forum before October 2012.

The person below me is a victim of the April 2013 Internet Catastrophe (as in, loss of posts and threads or the loss of accounts).

True.

The user below me has played Portal 2. (If you haven't, you are dead to me until you do)

True, even tried to make a few test chambers. None of them too good, but yeah, love the Portal franchise

The user below me is an Otaku

False, I'm a (legal) Chinese (immigrant).

The user below me is multilingual. (I'm not sure if I spelled it right...)

False, I only speak English.

The user below me has landed on Tylo.

Impacts count, right?

The user below me is a ninja.

Maybe ;P but you'll never know

The person below me is allergic to a food

False. I am allergic to nothing

The user below me is eating atm.

False, you will be crazy to suck all of the atmosphere.

The user below me did not survive the Internet Catastrophe of April 2013. (As in, you lost your account.)
